Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements UI
A Command Line Interface implementation of the UI.

      Description copied from interface: UI

      Parameters:

      workerId - the ID of the player's worker
